  • Constructor Details

    • V1connectionLEWrapper

      public V1connectionLEWrapper(@Nullable ESPClientListener listener, PacketFactory factory, long timeoutInMillis)
      Constructs a Bluetooth Low-Energy IV1connectionWrapper instance.
      Parameters:
      listener - The callback that will be invoked when ESP data is received.
      factory - PacketFactory used to construct ESP packets.
      timeoutInMillis - Number of milliseconds before the NoDataListener.onNoDataDetected() is invoked.

    • getCachedRSSI

      public int getCachedRSSI()
      Description copied from interface: IV1connectionWrapper
      Returns the last read RSSI for the connected remote BLE device. If no connection a value of '-127' will always be returned.
      Specified by:
      getCachedRSSI in interface IV1connectionWrapper
      Overrides:
      getCachedRSSI in class V1connectionBaseWrapper
      Returns:
      The last read RSSI value.
      See Also:
      • IV1connectionWrapper.readRemoteRSSI(RSSICallback)

    • enableCharacteristicNotifications

      protected boolean enableCharacteristicNotifications(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt gatt, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic charac, boolean enabled)
      Attempts to enable/disable notifications on both locally and on a remote device for the specified characteristic.
      Parameters:
      gatt - Bluetooth connection to a remote device.
      charac - Characteristic on which to enable notifications
      enabled - True to enable notification
      Returns:
      True if the enable/disable notifications was initiated.

    • readRemoteRSSI

      public boolean readRemoteRSSI(RSSICallback callback)
      Description copied from interface: IV1connectionWrapper
      Asynchronously reads the connected remote BLE devices RSSI and invokes callback once the value has been read.
      Specified by:
      readRemoteRSSI in interface IV1connectionWrapper
      Overrides:
      readRemoteRSSI in class V1connectionBaseWrapper
      Parameters:
      callback - the callback that will be invoked with the read back RSSI value.
      Returns:
      True if an Asynchronously read has taken place. If false is returned, check the log output for a hint as to why the call failed.
